About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Skiin is in beta-phase market launch and has been recently granted Health Canada medical device license and submitted to FDA for regulatory approval in the US market. The sensors and actuators embedded within our apparel create your Digital Identity, which will be consumed by those who matter to you - your family members, physicians, trainers, other IoT devices - without you consciously having to think about it. The line between the digital and physical world is becoming increasingly blurry and we believe textile is the next medium to bridge that gap.We are a multi-disciplinary technology team solving big challenges at the intersection of electronics, deep tech., software, design, advanced manufacturing, and data science.RoleWe currently seeking a dynamic and experienced General Accountant for Myant Inc. Company DescriptionCREATIVITY IS OUR SUPERPOWER. It’s our heritage and it’s also our future. Because we don’t just make toys. We create innovative products and experiences that inspire fans, entertain audiences and develop children through play. Mattel is at its best when every member of our team feels respected, included, and heard—when everyone can show up as themselves and do their best work every day. We value and share an infinite range of ideas and voices that evolve and broaden our perspectives with a reach that extends into all our brands, partners, and suppliers.The Team:MEGA - Mattel's Finance department is responsible for almost the entire spectrum of financial activities: accounts payable, treasury, taxation, financial accounting, cost, forecasting and financial analysis. Its objective is to support operations in their decision-making related to our business, respecting the requirements of the profession as well as the various deadlines, and this while maintaining a balance between personal life and work.Job DescriptionThe Opportunity: We are currently searching for a Financial Analyst to join our Finance team.What Your Impact Will Be: Reporting to the Sr. Manager, Finance, the Financial Analyst will have the following responsibilities:Analyze variances in financial statements and reconciliations of accounts;Prepare weekly cash flow forecasts;Participate in month end process and in the consolidation of the financial statements;Prepare general ledger entries and intercompany invoices;Prepare quarterly corporate reports;Support the manager and external consultants in the declaration and provision for tax;Additional tasks will be added in time for personal development and to develop backup for other employees. Additional InformationHow We Work:We are a purpose driven company aiming to empower generations to explore the wonder of childhood and reach their full potential. We live up to our purpose employing the following behaviors:We collaborate: Being a part of Mattel means being part of one team with shared values and common goals. Every person counts and working closely together always brings better results. Partnership is our process and our collective capabilities is our superpower. We innovate: At Mattel we always aim to find new and better ways to create innovative products and experiences. No matter where you work in the organization, you can always make a difference and have real impact. We welcome new ideas and value new initiatives that challenge conventional thinking. We execute: We are a performance-driven company. We strive for excellence and are focused on pursuing best-in-class outcomes. We believe in accountability and ownership and know that our people are at their best when they are empowered to create and deliver results. Who We Are:Mattel is a leading global toy and family entertainment company and owner of one of the most iconic brand portfolios in the world. We engage consumers and fans through our franchise brands, including Barbie, Hot Wheels, Fisher-Price, American Girl, Thomas & Friends, UNO, Masters of the Universe, Matchbox, Monster High, MEGA and Polly Pocket, as well as other popular properties that we own or license in partnership with global entertainment companies. Our offerings include toys, content, consumer products, digital and live experiences. About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Skiin is in beta-phase market launch and has been recently granted Health Canada medical device license and submitted to FDA for regulatory approval in the US market. The sensors and actuators embedded within our apparel create your Digital Identity, which will be consumed by those who matter to you - your family members, physicians, trainers, other IoT devices - without you consciously having to think about it. About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Skiin is in beta-phase market launch and has been recently granted Health Canada medical device license and submitted to FDA for regulatory approval in the US market. The sensors and actuators embedded within our apparel create your Digital Identity, which will be consumed by those who matter to you - your family members, physicians, trainers, other IoT devices - without you consciously having to think about it. About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Skiin is in beta-phase market launch and has been recently granted Health Canada medical device license and submitted to FDA for regulatory approval in the US market. The sensors and actuators embedded within our apparel create your Digital Identity, which will be consumed by those who matter to you - your family members, physicians, trainers, other IoT devices - without you consciously having to think about it. The line between the digital and physical world is becoming increasingly blurry and we believe textile is the next medium to bridge that gap.We are a multi-disciplinary technology team solving big challenges at the intersection of electronics, deep tech., software, design, advanced manufacturing, and data science.RoleWe currently seeking a dynamic and experienced General Accountant for Myant Inc. About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Skiin is in beta-phase market launch and has been recently granted Health Canada medical device license and submitted to FDA for regulatory approval in the US market. The sensors and actuators embedded within our apparel create your Digital Identity, which will be consumed by those who matter to you - your family members, physicians, trainers, other IoT devices - without you consciously having to think about it. The line between the digital and physical world is becoming increasingly blurry and we believe textile is the next medium to bridge that gap.We are a multi-disciplinary technology team solving big challenges at the intersection of electronics, deep tech., software, design, advanced manufacturing, and data science.RoleWe currently seeking a dynamic and experienced General Accountant for Myant Inc. Description de l'entrepriseLA CRÉATIVITÉ EST NOTRE SUPERPOUVOIR. C’est notre héritage et c’est aussi notre avenir. Parce que nous ne faisons pas que fabriquer des jouets. Informations complémentairesNotre Environnement De Travail :Nous sommes une entreprise motivée par sa mission qui vise à permettre à la prochaine génération d'explorer les merveilles de l'enfance et d'atteindre son plein potentiel. Nous sommes à la hauteur de notre mission au quotidien en mettant de l’avant les actions suivantes : Nous collaborons: Faire partie de Mattel signifie faire partie d'une équipe avec des valeurs et des objectifs communs. Chaque personne compte et travailler en étroite collaboration donne toujours de meilleurs résultats. Le partenariat est notre processus et nos capacités collectives sont notre superpouvoir.  Nous innovons: Chez Mattel, nous cherchons toujours à trouver de nouvelles et meilleures façons de créer des expériences et des produits innovants. Peu importe où vous travaillez dans l'organisation, vous pouvez toujours faire une différence et avoir un impact réel. Nous accueillons les nouvelles idées et valorisons les nouvelles initiatives qui mettent au défi les façons de penser conventionnelles.  Nous exécutons: Nous sommes une entreprise axée sur la performance. Nous visons l'excellence et nous nous concentrons sur la recherche des meilleurs résultats. Nous croyons en la responsabilisation et la prise en charge et savons que nos employés sont à leur meilleur lorsqu'ils sont investis du pouvoir de créer et de produire des résultats. Qui Nous Sommes:Mattel est une entreprise mondiale de jouets de premier plan et détenteur de l’un des plus importants portefeuilles de franchises de divertissement au monde, destinés aux enfants et aux familles. Nous créons des expériences et des produits innovants qui inspirent, divertissent et développent les enfants par le jeu. Job Description: Starlight Investments, in conjunction with WP Osborne Executive Search, is seeking a Manager, Financial Reporting, to join their Public Entity Reporting team.Manager, Financial Reporting – Public Entity ReportingStarlight is one of the most exciting real estate firms to work for in Canada with a track record devoted to creating long-term investor value. Starlight co-invests in each asset, creating meaningful alignment in each of its strategies including joint ventures with institutional partners, publicly traded real estate investment trusts and publicly traded real estate investment funds.This role reports directly to the Director, Finance – Public Entity Reporting Team (“PERT”). PERT is a team of highly motivated, CPA experts dedicated to assisting with the preparation and oversight of financial reporting relating to all publicly traded entities managed by Starlight, which currently includes four listed companies invested in Canadian residential, Canadian commercial and U.S. residential assets. This specific role will oversee financial reporting for True North Commercial REIT (“TNC”) listed on the TSX and one of Canada’s premier commercial real estate companies, and also assist with the standardization of financial reporting for all Starlight investment vehicles by working with the other members of PERT and other finance leads throughout Starlight’s various business lines. We work in a collaborative, open environment and our head office is on the Bloor subway line (we cover Presto passes!). We cover CPA professional dues, provide learning and professional development opportunities, as well as fun team outings and company events throughout the year.Duties and ResponsibilitiesFinancial Reporting Manage the preparation of high-quality, effective and efficient quarterly investor reporting materials including financial statements, press release, investor presentations and MD&A;Manage the internal approval process of financial statements with the Director, Finance, Starlight legal team and Starlight executives providing the opportunity to have a high level of exposure to various senior team members; Assist with the preparation of other public filings including management information circular, annual information form and other filings as required;Lead a special project to standardize and automate the production of all financial statements for Starlight’s partnerships through Workiva and data integration to Starlight’s source systems; Streamline reporting processes to simplify the production of financial statements and eliminate risk of error in Workiva;Prepare accounting Memos as and when required;Assist with financial reporting to new business initiatives, as required.  Financial Analysis and AccountingDevelop an understanding of key drivers required to draft financial reporting and coordinate internal review meetings to ensure alignment of key messaging in quarterly and annual reporting amongst all internal stakeholders;Manage external audits required including the preparation of working papers and relationship management with audit firms to ensure timely audit completion; Acquisition and Financing Management Coordinate with portfolio finance teams to ensure the acquisition, disposition and refinancing accounting are completed in time for monthly and quarterly reporting;Provide support on financial aspects of property acquisitions, dispositions, and property financing activities, as required.Cash and Debt Management Understand the key drivers of liquidity and debt to the extent required to draft financial reporting and communicate key message to investors. QualificationsThe Manager, Financial Reporting will possess a University degree in Business/Accounting and a professional accounting (CPA) designation; a minimum of 3 years of public accounting or industry experience ideally in the real estate industry with strong technical accounting knowledge; experience writing or reviewing financial statements, MD&A and press releases; excellent communication, interpersonal and organizational skills; as well as having an analytical mindset, balancing detail with understanding business needs. financial reporting, to help drive the company’s financial strategy.·        Support strategy development while prioritizing and ensuring initiatives can be funded.·        Oversee investments and partners.·        Responsible for all financial aspects of property acquisitions, dispositions, and negotiations.·        Possess a strong understanding of the company’s business model and overall development.·        Management of the accounting and finance functions.·        Provide risk management, mitigation, and analysis.·        Manage and compare sales and profit projections to actual figures, budget expenses to actual expenses, and all required adjustments to future projections and budgets.·        Provide advice and guidance on tax-related matters.·        Focus on developing strategies, policies, and evaluations for future land & project acquisitions and investments.·        Direct accounting policies, procedures, and internal controls.·        Prepare all financial statements, including income statements, balance sheets, management reports, executive summaries, tax returns, and all government agency reports.·        Cash flow and budget preparation and future growth and decision-making.·        Keep apprised of emerging accounting, sales, and real estate development trends.  Key Skills ·        Superior problem-solving and forward-thinking 100M.·        Professional affiliations within the local business community.·        Making formal presentations to potential equity investors and or senior bank officials. With passion and professionalism.

We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Description de l'entrepriseLA CRÉATIVITÉ EST NOTRE SUPERPOUVOIR. C’est notre héritage et c’est aussi notre avenir. Parce que nous ne faisons pas que fabriquer des jouets. Nous créons des expériences et des produits innovants qui inspirent, divertissent et développent les enfants par le jeu. Mattel est à son meilleur lorsque chaque membre de notre équipe se sent respecté, inclus et entendu - lorsque chacun peut se montrer tel qu’il est et faire de son mieux chaque jour. Nous apprécions et partageons une gamme infinie d'idées et de voix qui évoluent et élargissent nos perspectives avec une portée qui s'étend à toutes nos marques, partenaires et fournisseurs.L’Équipe :Le service des finances de MEGA – Mattel a sous sa responsabilité presque tout le spectre des activités financières: comptes payables, trésorerie, imposition, comptabilité financière, coût de revient, prévisions et analyses financières. Son objectif est de soutenir les opérations dans leurs prises de décisions reliées à nos affaires, en respectant les exigences de la profession ainsi que les échéanciers variés, et ce tout en gardant un équilibre entre la vie personnelle et le travail.Description du posteL’Opportunité :Nous sommes présentement à la recherche d’un analyste financier afin de se joindre à notre équipe du service des finances.Votre Impact :Relevant du gestionnaire principal, Finances, l'analyste financier assumera les responsabilités suivantes :Analyser les variances des états financiers et les réconciliations des comptes;Préparer les prévisions hebdomadaires de trésorerie;Participer aux fins des mois et à la consolidation des états financiers;Préparer des écritures au grand livre et les factures inter-compagnie;Préparer les rapports trimestriels corporatifs;Soutenir le gestionnaire et les consultants externes dans la déclaration et la provision d’impôt;Des tâches supplémentaires s’ajouteront au fil du temps pour offrir du développement personnel et assurer un soutien entre employés du département. QualificationsCe Que Nous Recherchons :Baccalauréat en comptabilité, CPA est un atout;3 à 5 ans d'expérience en comptabilité ou analyse financière;De l’expérience en trésorerie est un atout;De l’expérience avec le système comptable Oracle est un atout;Habileté à prioriser un travail bien fait tout en respectant les dates limites, ainsi que persévérer afin de mener les tâches à bien;Maîtrise de Microsoft Excel (formules avancées, tableaux croisés dynamiques);Bilingue, bonnes connaissances de l’anglais à l'oral et à l'écrit. Informations complémentairesNotre Environnement De Travail :Nous sommes une entreprise motivée par sa mission qui vise à permettre à la prochaine génération d'explorer les merveilles de l'enfance et d'atteindre son plein potentiel. Nous sommes à la hauteur de notre mission au quotidien en mettant de l’avant les actions suivantes : Nous collaborons: Faire partie de Mattel signifie faire partie d'une équipe avec des valeurs et des objectifs communs. Chaque personne compte et travailler en étroite collaboration donne toujours de meilleurs résultats. Le partenariat est notre processus et nos capacités collectives sont notre superpouvoir.  Nous innovons: Chez Mattel, nous cherchons toujours à trouver de nouvelles et meilleures façons de créer des expériences et des produits innovants. Peu importe où vous travaillez dans l'organisation, vous pouvez toujours faire une différence et avoir un impact réel. Nous accueillons les nouvelles idées et valorisons les nouvelles initiatives qui mettent au défi les façons de penser conventionnelles.  Nous exécutons: Nous sommes une entreprise axée sur la performance. Nous visons l'excellence et nous nous concentrons sur la recherche des meilleurs résultats. Nous croyons en la responsabilisation et la prise en charge et savons que nos employés sont à leur meilleur lorsqu'ils sont investis du pouvoir de créer et de produire des résultats. Qui Nous Sommes:Mattel est une entreprise mondiale de jouets de premier plan et détenteur de l’un des plus importants portefeuilles de franchises de divertissement au monde, destinés aux enfants et aux familles. Nous créons des expériences et des produits innovants qui inspirent, divertissent et développent les enfants par le jeu. Nous engageons les consommateurs à travers notre portefeuille de marques emblématiques, notamment Barbie, Hot Wheels, Fisher-Price, American Girl, Thomas & Friends, UNO et MEGA, ainsi que d'autres propriétés intellectuelles populaires que nous possédons ou pour lesquelles nous détenons des ententes de licenciation avec des entreprises mondiales de divertissement. Nos offres comprennent du contenu cinématographique et télévisuel, des jeux, de la musique et des événements en direct. Nous opérons dans 35 sites et nos produits sont disponibles dans plus de 150 pays en collaboration avec les principales entreprises de vente au détail et de commerce électronique au monde. Depuis sa fondation en 1945, Mattel est fier d'être un partenaire de confiance pour permettre aux enfants d'explorer les merveilles de l'enfance et d'atteindre leur plein potentiel.Rendez-nous visite sur https://jobs.mattel.com/ et www.instagram.com/MattelCareers.Mattel souscrit au principe d’équité en matière d’emploi et nous souhaitons que vous puissiez être votre moi authentique au travail à tous les jours. About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Skiin is in beta-phase market launch and has been recently granted Health Canada medical device license and submitted to FDA for regulatory approval in the US market. The sensors and actuators embedded within our apparel create your Digital Identity, which will be consumed by those who matter to you - your family members, physicians, trainers, other IoT devices - without you consciously having to think about it. The line between the digital and physical world is becoming increasingly blurry and we believe textile is the next medium to bridge that gap.We are a multi-disciplinary technology team solving big challenges at the intersection of electronics, deep tech., software, design, advanced manufacturing, and data science.RoleWe currently seeking a dynamic and experienced General Accountant for Myant Inc. About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Skiin is in beta-phase market launch and has been recently granted Health Canada medical device license and submitted to FDA for regulatory approval in the US market. The sensors and actuators embedded within our apparel create your Digital Identity, which will be consumed by those who matter to you - your family members, physicians, trainers, other IoT devices - without you consciously having to think about it. Company DescriptionCREATIVITY IS OUR SUPERPOWER. It’s our heritage and it’s also our future. Because we don’t just make toys. We create innovative products and experiences that inspire fans, entertain audiences and develop children through play. Mattel is at its best when every member of our team feels respected, included, and heard—when everyone can show up as themselves and do their best work every day. We value and share an infinite range of ideas and voices that evolve and broaden our perspectives with a reach that extends into all our brands, partners, and suppliers.The Team:MEGA - Mattel's Finance department is responsible for almost the entire spectrum of financial activities: accounts payable, treasury, taxation, financial accounting, cost, forecasting and financial analysis. Its objective is to support operations in their decision-making related to our business, respecting the requirements of the profession as well as the various deadlines, and this while maintaining a balance between personal life and work.Job DescriptionThe Opportunity: We are currently searching for a Financial Analyst to join our Finance team.What Your Impact Will Be: Reporting to the Sr. Manager, Finance, the Financial Analyst will have the following responsibilities:Analyze variances in financial statements and reconciliations of accounts;Prepare weekly cash flow forecasts;Participate in month end process and in the consolidation of the financial statements;Prepare general ledger entries and intercompany invoices;Prepare quarterly corporate reports;Support the manager and external consultants in the declaration and provision for tax;Additional tasks will be added in time for personal development and to develop backup for other employees. Additional InformationHow We Work:We are a purpose driven company aiming to empower generations to explore the wonder of childhood and reach their full potential. Every person counts and working closely together always brings better results. Partnership is our process and our collective capabilities is our superpower. We innovate: At Mattel we always aim to find new and better ways to create innovative products and experiences. No matter where you work in the organization, you can always make a difference and have real impact. We welcome new ideas and value new initiatives that challenge conventional thinking. We execute: We are a performance-driven company. We strive for excellence and are focused on pursuing best-in-class outcomes. We believe in accountability and ownership and know that our people are at their best when they are empowered to create and deliver results. Who We Are:Mattel is a leading global toy and family entertainment company and owner of one of the most iconic brand portfolios in the world. We engage consumers and fans through our franchise brands, including Barbie, Hot Wheels, Fisher-Price, American Girl, Thomas & Friends, UNO, Masters of the Universe, Matchbox, Monster High, MEGA and Polly Pocket, as well as other popular properties that we own or license in partnership with global entertainment companies. Our offerings include toys, content, consumer products, digital and live experiences. About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Skiin is in beta-phase market launch and has been recently granted Health Canada medical device license and submitted to FDA for regulatory approval in the US market. The sensors and actuators embedded within our apparel create your Digital Identity, which will be consumed by those who matter to you - your family members, physicians, trainers, other IoT devices - without you consciously having to think about it. Other ConsiderationsBe based in Montreal;Knowledge of OneStream is an asset for this position;Bilingual (English & French). Fresh fruit in the office, virtual yoga and meditation classes, as well as other opportunities to get involved in community outreach and employee engagement initiatives. About UsAt Myant, we are creating the world’s first expressive and continuous digital presence platform, enabled by integrating technology directly into clothing and augmented by other devices, wearables, and IOT. We see the evolution of society where every member gets to participate from anywhere and anytime through a whole-body experience, mostly in a passive or ambient manner to foster ubiquitous accessibility. Humans have a fundamental desire and need to be connected to our environment, family, community, and technology. This level of connection will create a paradigm shift in the way we deal with each other, especially from afar, allowing for more meaningful relationships, and more in-depth representation of ourselves.The need for this type of connection is not new. There are many companies working on ways to connect humans in singularity with technology, however most of these technologies are based on devices that are often used in episodical ways hence, leading to poor adoption or reliability. In general, innovation and technology have delivered significant benefits for many members of society. However, there are those who are left behind, namely the very young, the marginalized, the old and the sick. The challenge of inclusion for those left behind requires us to move beyond device focused strategies, towards an interface that we use naturally, every day. We believe that textile is that primary interface, used in clothing, coverings, carpeting and more, we wear and are surrounded by textiles universally, always.Such an interface could fuse data with other devices that we use periodically and data with other IoTs in the environment. People could then leverage their physical presence over their digital presence to communicate and share personal wellbeing. This could unlock healthcare that is proactive and preventative, social connectedness that is more profound, enable care distribution models to be seamless and on demand, better fitness insights, safer working environments and more.The vision for SKIIN -our first consumer-facing brand- is to enhance human ability through connected clothing and textiles. Skiin is in beta-phase market launch and has been recently granted Health Canada medical device license and submitted to FDA for regulatory approval in the US market. The sensors and actuators embedded within our apparel create your Digital Identity, which will be consumed by those who matter to you - your family members, physicians, trainers, other IoT devices - without you consciously having to think about it. The line between the digital and physical world is becoming increasingly blurry and we believe textile is the next medium to bridge that gap.We are a multi-disciplinary technology team solving big challenges at the intersection of electronics, deep tech., software, design, advanced manufacturing, and data science.RoleWe currently seeking a dynamic and experienced General Accountant for Myant Inc.
